TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Barrier extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 使多个任务能够采用并行方式依据某种算法在多个阶段中协同工作。

span.span: Enables multiple tasks to cooperatively work on an algorithm in parallel through multiple phases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过一系列阶段共同合作的一组任务，该组中的每个任务都在给定阶段收到 ，并隐式等待所有其他任务到达。A group of tasks cooperate by moving through a series of phases, where each in the group signals it has arrived at the in a given phase and implicitly waits for all others to arrive. 相同的 可用于多个阶段。The same can be used for multiple phases. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用屏障：The following example shows how to use a barrier: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Barrier#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.barrier/cs/barrier.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Barrier#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.barrier/vb/barrier.vb#01)]

threadsafe.span: 的所有公共和受保护成员都是线程安全的，并且可以从多个线程并发使用，而 Dispose 除外，只需在 上的所有其他操作都完成时使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of Dispose, which must only be used when all other operations on the have completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 participantCount, class System.Action`1<class System.Threading.Barrier> postPhaseAction) cil managed
Public Sub New (participantCount As Integer, postPhaseAction As Action(Of Barrier))

span.span: The number of participating threads.

param.name: postPhaseAction

span.span: The to be executed after each phase.

param.span: 可传递 NULL（在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing）以执行未执行任何操作。

span.span: null (Nothing in Visual Basic) may be passed to indicate no action is taken.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在一个阶段中，所有参与者都到达关卡后，将执行 `postPhaseAction` 委托。The `postPhaseAction` delegate will be executed after all participants have arrived at the barrier in one phase. 在 postPhaseAction 委托执行完毕之前，不会将参与者发布到下一阶段。The participants will not be released to the next phase until the postPhaseAction delegate has completed execution.

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than 32,767.

related.span: 屏障

span.span: Barrier

related.span: 如何：使用屏障来使并发操作保持同步

span.span: How to: Synchronize Concurrent Operations with a Barrier

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int64 AddParticipant() cil managed

summary.span: 通知 ，告知其将会有另一个参与者。

span.span: Notifies the that there will be an additional participant.

returns.span: 新参与者将首先参与的屏障的阶段编号。

span.span: The phase number of the barrier in which the new participants will first participate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果关卡当前正在执行 "后阶段" 操作，此调用将被阻止，直到 "后期阶段" 操作完成并且关卡已转到下一阶段。If the barrier is currently executing a post phase action, this call is blocked until the post phase action completes and the barrier has moved on to the next phase.

exception.span: 已释放当前实例。

span.span: The current instance has already been disposed.

exception.span: 添加参与者将导致屏障的参与者计数超过 32,767。

span.span: Adding a participant would cause the barrier's participant count to exceed 32,767.
-or-

exception.span: 该方法从阶段后操作中调用。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 类的当前实例占用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 `Dispose`后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

exception.span: 该方法从阶段后操作中调用。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 为 true 则释放托管资源和非托管资源；为 false 则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the , and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与 的大多数成员不同，Dispose 并不是线程安全的，并且不能与此实例的其他成员同时使用。Unlike most of the members of , Dispose is not thread-safe and may not be used concurrently with other members of this instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveParticipants(int32 participantCount) cil managed

param.name: participantCount
param.span: 要从屏障中移除的其他参与者的数量。

span.span: The number of additional participants to remove from the barrier.

summary.span: 通知 ，告知其将会减少一些参与者。

span.span: Notifies the that there will be fewer participants.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `participantCount` 参与者已在等待关卡，则此删除操作将完成关卡，执行 "后期阶段" 操作，并且所有参与者都将唤醒，就像要删除的此参与者已成功达到关卡一样。If `participantCount` participants are already waiting on the barrier, this removal fulfills the barrier, the post phase action is executed and all of the participants are woken as if this participant being removed had successfully reached the barrier.

exception.span: 已释放当前实例。

span.span: The total participant count is less than the specified

span.span: The barrier already has 0 participants.
-or-

exception.span: 该方法从阶段后操作中调用。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action.
-or-

exception.span: 当前的参与者计数小于指定 participantCount

span.span: current participant count is less than the specified participantCount

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SignalAndWait() cil managed

summary.span: 发出参与者已达到屏障并等待所有其他参与者也达到屏障。

span.span: Signals that a participant has reached the barrier and waits for all other participants to reach the barrier as well.

exception.span: 已释放当前实例。

span.span: The current instance has already been disposed.

exception.span: 该方法从阶段后操作中调用，当前屏障具有 0 个参与者，或该屏障被注册为参与者的更多线程终止。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action, the barrier currently has 0 participants, or the barrier is signaled by more threads than are registered as participants.

exception.span: 在所有参与线程调用了 SignalAndWait 之后，如果关卡的后期阶段操作中引发了异常，该异常将包装在 BarrierPostPhaseException 中并在所有参与线程上引发。

span.span: If an exception is thrown from the post phase action of a Barrier after all participating threads have called SignalAndWait, the exception will be wrapped in a BarrierPostPhaseException and be thrown on all participating threads.

related.span: 屏障

span.span: Barrier

related.span: 如何：使用屏障来使并发操作保持同步

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool SignalAndWait(int32 millisecondsTimeout) cil managed
Public Function SignalAndWait (millisecondsTimeout As Integer) As Boolean

param.name: millisecondsTimeout
param.span: 等待的毫秒数，或为 (-1)，表示无限期等待。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait, or (-1) to wait indefinitely.

summary.span: 发出参与者已达到屏障的信号，并等待所有其他参与者也达到屏障，同时使用 32 位带符号整数测量超时。

span.span: Signals that a participant has reached the barrier and waits for all other participants to reach the barrier as well, using a 32-bit signed integer to measure the timeout.

returns.span: 如果所有参与者都已在指定时间内达到屏障，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all participants reached the barrier within the specified time; otherwise .

exception.span: 已释放当前实例。

span.span: The current instance has already been disposed.

exception.span: 是一个非 -1 的负数，而 -1 表示无限期超时。

span.span: is a negative number other than -1, which represents an infinite time-out.

exception.span: 该方法从阶段后操作中调用，当前屏障具有 0 个参与者，或该屏障被注册为参与者的更多线程终止。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action, the barrier currently has 0 participants, or the barrier is signaled by more threads than are registered as participants.

exception.span: 在所有参与线程调用了 SignalAndWait 之后，如果关卡的后期阶段操作中引发了异常，该异常将包装在 BarrierPostPhaseException 中并在所有参与线程上引发。

span.span: If an exception is thrown from the post phase action of a Barrier after all participating threads have called SignalAndWait, the exception will be wrapped in a BarrierPostPhaseException and be thrown on all participating threads.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool SignalAndWait (int millisecondsTimeout, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken);
.method public hidebysig instance bool SignalAndWait(int32 millisecondsTimeout, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
Public Function SignalAndWait (millisecondsTimeout As Integer, cancellationToken As CancellationToken) As Boolean
public: bool SignalAndWait(int millisecondsTimeout, System::Threading::CancellationToken cancellationToken);

param.name: millisecondsTimeout
param.span: 等待的毫秒数，或为 (-1)，表示无限期等待。

span.span: The number of milliseconds to wait, or (-1) to wait indefinitely.
The to observe.

summary.span: 发出参与者已达到屏障的信号，并等待所有其他参与者也达到屏障，使用 32 位带符号整数测量超时，同时观察取消标记。

span.span: Signals that a participant has reached the barrier and waits for all other participants to reach the barrier as well, using a 32-bit signed integer to measure the timeout, while observing a cancellation token.

returns.span: 如果所有参与者都已在指定时间内达到屏障，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: if all participants reached the barrier within the specified time; otherwise false

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `cancellationToken` 在信号生效之前已取消，则会引发 并且 值不会减少。If the `cancellationToken` was canceled before the signal took effect, then an is thrown and the value is not decreased. 如果 `cancellationToken` 未被取消或在信号生效后被取消，则 会降低，并且不会引发任何 。If the `cancellationToken` is not canceled or is canceled after the signal takes effect then is decreased and no is thrown.

exception.span: 该方法从阶段后操作中调用，当前屏障具有 0 个参与者，或该屏障被注册为参与者的更多线程终止。

span.span: The method was invoked from within a post-phase action, the barrier currently has 0 participants, or the barrier is signaled by more threads than are registered as participants.

related.span: 屏障

span.span: Barrier

related.span: 如何：使用屏障来使并发操作保持同步

span.span: How to: Synchronize Concurrent Operations with a Barrier
